attributes.action: Hold another vote a day after Brexit to see whether we want to re-join the EU
attributes.additional_details: This may be a stupid idea, but is it really as stupid an idea as Brexit? No. No it's not.
attributes.background: Although it may be undemocratic to undo the outcome of the 2016 vote who says we can't just vote the day after Brexit (presuming we're all still alive) to re-join the EU? We technically would have left the EU as promised, it just wouldn't be a permanent change.
